Class ServoRobot

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jflux.api.common.rk.property.PropertyChangeSource, Robot<ServoJoint>

    public class ServoRobot
extends AbstractRobot<ServoJoint>
    Robot implementation using Servos.
    Author:
    Matthew Stevenson
